mapper.select: SELECT m.memberId AS memberId ,m.memberPassword AS memberPassword ,m.mainBusinessCode AS mainBusinessCode ,m.levelMemberCode AS levelMemberCode ,m.memberName AS memberName ,m.memberGender AS memberGender ,m.memberPhone AS memberPhone ,m.memberResidentRegistrationNumber AS memberResidentRegistrationNumber ,m.memberState AS memberState ,m.memberRegDate AS memberRegDate ,m.memberHiredDate AS memberHiredDate ,m.memberpostaladdress AS memberpostaladdress ,m.memberstreetaddress AS memberstreetaddress FROM k3_tb_member AS m;
